general.gigTitle: do website development, develop custom website as full stack web developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: Expert Software Developer Desktop Mobile and Web
sellerCard.description: Saiful Islam is a proficient web developer specializing in the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express js, React js, Node js), PHP (Laravel), and WordPress. He excels in creating dynamic, user-friendly websites and web applications, delivering high-quality solutions from concept to launch.

description.content:
Hello, and a big smile your way!


Are you tired of using different CMS for website development that has thousands of plugins, subscriptions, and limitations?


And now you are looking for something special that has no limitations so that you can build any features and build your dream business website or web application, using custom code.


I'm Fahim, a full-stack web developer. I've done a lot of website development using advanced technology. I worked with front-end development, back-end, Rest API development,


Tech-Stack:


  • Javascript
  • Python
  • React
  • Next.Js
  • PHP
  • Laravel
  • Node.Js
  • Express.Js


Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, DevOps


Application Category:


  • Social media blog site
  • Project or Inventory Management site
  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
  • Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)
  • Human Resources (HR) Management
  • E-commerce Solutions
  • Educational Software
  • Health/Medical Software
  • Database Management
  • Real Estate Management
  • Travel/Booking website chat
  • Membership
  • Portfolio
  • Dashboard
  • Landing page


Let's talk, I'm flexible with my working hours and will be happy to discuss your project at your earliest convenience.

slide.name: do website development, develop custom website as full stack web developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is software development, and how can it benefit my business?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Software development involves creating, building, deploying, and maintaining software. For businesses, it automates processes, increases efficiency, frees up employees for strategic work, and provides bespoke applications for customers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What programming languages do software developers typically use for web app development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Software developers commonly use Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, Ruby, C#, PHP, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and Go for web app development, depending on factors like app type, timeline, technical knowledge, and budget.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How much does a software development project cost?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Software development project costs range from $1000 to $10000, depending on factors like project size, complexity, developer experience, and use of third-party tools and services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your development process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our process includes requirement gathering, proposal, design, development, testing, and delivery, with continuous client communication throughout.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long will my project take?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Timelines vary based on complexity. Small to medium projects typically take 2-4 weeks, while larger projects may take several months.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We use React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Python, Django, Flutter, MongoDB, MySQL, and AWS, among others.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer post-development support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we provide post-development support and maintenance, including bug fixes, updates, and performance enhancements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure confidentiality and security?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We sign NDAs and follow best practices for security, including secure coding, data encryption, and regular security audits

reviews.comment: I am so happy I chose to work with Saiful for this project.  He delivered a high quality and professional web application that I can immediately start using for my business.  I'm particularly impressed by how fast this application was delivered and how quickly he understood my complex requirements.  Highly recommend to anyone looking to build a full stack business web solution!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

reviews.comment: Saiful's work in WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT was truly exceptional, with his CODE EXPERTISE and thorough documentation that went above and beyond expectations.  His quick responsiveness and cooperative spirit made collaborating a breeze. The initial build of the website looks promising, and I'm excited to see the final product!

Saiful took charge of the website development with great skill and attention to detail. He ensured clear communication throughout, keeping me updated every step of the way. The results were outstanding, and I am more than satisfied with his work!

Exceptional Web Development Service!
I recently worked with Farhad on a Airbnb site, and the experience was outstanding. They demonstrated a deep understanding of web development principles, delivering high-quality, functional, and visually appealing results.

Highlights of the experience:

Professional Communication: Farhad was responsive and clear in all communications, ensuring we stayed aligned throughout the project.
Technical Expertise: They handled available, responsive, efficient in design, SEO optimization, and custom code functionality with ease.
Timeliness: The project was delivered on schedule, with no compromises on quality.
Problem-Solving: Any challenges that arose were handled efficiently, showcasing their adaptability and expertise.
After-Project Support: Even after delivery, Farhad offered support for minor adjustments and questions.
Overall, I highly recommend Farhad to anyone looking for a skilled and reliable web developer. I will definitely be returning for future projects!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

reviews.comment: Saifuls approach to website development was nothing short of exceptional. He managed every detail with care and provided frequent updates, which made the project flow effortlessly. His ability to deliver a stress-free and highly professional experience speaks volumes about his expertise and dedication.

reviews_snippet.comment:
I recently had the pleasure of working with this company on a comprehensive websie prooject that was quite extensive and involved with 15 pages of content. I must say they did a great job. From start to finish the team demonstrated exceptional skills, enuring that I was kept in the loop at every stage of the process. They were always available to answer questions, provide updates, and address any concerns I had, which made the entire experience smooth and stress-free. 
What truly impressed me was their remarkable attention to detail. Every aspect of the website was meticulously crafted, from the layout to the functionality, and it was clear that they genuinely cared about delivering a high-quality product. The final result exceeded my expectations, showcasing not only their technical expertise but also their creative vision.

I would highly recommend this company to anyone looking for a professional and reliable web development team. Their dedication to client satisfaction and their ability to manage complex projects with ease is truly commendable. If youre in need of a website that stands out and meets your needs, look no further. Fantastic work and after product support.
Saiful was excellent to work withextremely skilled and easygoing. He got the job done without any complications. I would definitely recommend him!

Ive never worked with such great and professional team, the level of politeness and dedication to the project was very impressive. I found a business partner for many years to come, and will keep utilizing their service many more times in the near future. Thank you again for going the extra mile for me

Saiful did an AMAZING job on our UI design! His attention to detail, professionalism, and ability to exceed expectations were outstanding . He was polite, timely, and went above and beyond throughout the project. Looking forward to the final product once the front end and back end are completed!
Saiful delivered outstanding work on my website, exceeding my expectations. Im more than happy to recommend him for anyone seeking top-notch web development expertise.
